nodes.text: Fahs Oxsor was an Issori smuggler who was well known for his flamboyant escapades against the Galactic Empire.

Fahs's family was fanatical about their political beliefs, but Fahs was overwhelmed by their beliefs and fled Issor to pursue a life of adventure. He joined Toob Ancher aboard the Glory as a gunner and first mate. Fahs retired to Redcap, where he spent more than ten years evading the Empire. He eventually became a miner.
